What are the treatments for Bjrnstad syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Bjrnstad syndrome:  - Centers for Disease Control and Prevention: Hearing Loss in Children: Screening and Diagnosis  - Genetic Testing Registry: Pili torti-deafness syndrome   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery
